channel.title: Rune-Strand Pk server
channel.description:
[u][url=http://www.rune-strand.com]Website[/url] [url=http://rune-strand.com/chat/]Forums[/url] [url=http://rune-strand.com/webclient.html]PlayNow[/url][/u]
[u][b]Promotional Video (New one coming soon when we get more players)- [/b][/u][youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FNtpSuvH3iM[/youtube]
[b][size=x-large]Features-[/size] *Instant Pking with Npc's to get gear from, the commands ::veng and ::barrage to assign runes *Npc's for teleporting *Fally Pking and oblisk teleports for pking! *Auth System for Voting *Unique Wildy Pking Areas *Dicing *Great Pking *Beast hybridding *Friendly Community *Forum re-done completely to look pro *Hosted on a VPS *Pking with Pures/Mains *Clan and wildy Pking *Fally Multi Teams *Old school and Energetic *Fully Working PvP System with Announcements [/b]
[center][u][b]Images[/b][/u][/center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/miEtvYa.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/g4k3Uoh.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZihCnxw.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WkmHMtC.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Orpj8qS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XSKXxTB.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/BNletgL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/suc213v.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/DdyCja0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/FTjABpP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/o0ZjN5y.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/JPgyJin.png[/img]

item.title: Rune-Strand Pk server
item.dc:creator: @runestrandpk runestrandpk
item.description:
@runestrandpk wrote:

Website
Forums
PlayNow

Promotional Video (New one coming soon when we get more players)-
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FNtpSuvH3iM[/youtube]

[size=x-large]Features-[/size]
*Instant Pking with Npc’s to get gear from, the commands ::veng and ::barrage to assign runes
*Npc’s for teleporting
*Fally Pking and oblisk teleports for pking!
*Auth System for Voting
*Unique Wildy Pking Areas
*Dicing
*Great Pking
*Beast hybridding
*Friendly Community
*Forum re-done completely to look pro
*Hosted on a VPS
*Pking with Pures/Mains
*Clan and wildy Pking
*Fally Multi Teams
*Old school and Energetic
*Fully Working PvP System with Announcements
